objects.name: RedDelta Modified PlugX Infection Chain Operations
objects.description: [RedDelta Modified PlugX Infection Chain Operations](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0047) was executed by [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) from mid-2023 through the end of 2024 against multiple entities in East and Southeast Asia. [RedDelta Modified PlugX Infection Chain Operations](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0047) involved phishing to deliver malicious files or links to users prompting follow-on installer downloads to load [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) on victim machines in a persistent state.(Citation: Recorded Future RedDelta 2025)
aliases: RedDelta Modified PlugX Infection Chain Operations

external_references.description: Insikt Group. (2025, January 9). Chinese State-Sponsored RedDelta Targeted Taiwan, Mongolia, and Southeast Asia with Adapted PlugX Infection Chain. Retrieved January 14, 2025.
